net.tridentsdk.event

Interface Events

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Collection<EventNotifier>, Iterable<EventNotifier>, Registry<EventNotifier>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventHandler

    @ThreadSafe
public interface Events
extends Registry<EventNotifier>
    The access point to the server's event handler
    Since:
    0.4-alpha
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fire(Event event)
      Notifies listeners of the event type of the event to be fired
      void registerListener(Plugin plugin, Listener listener)
      Normally not needed to be used.
      void unregister(Class<? extends Listener> cls)
      Removes the listener from the caller queue, preventing it from being invoked

    • Method Detail

      • fire

        void fire(Event event)
        Notifies listeners of the event type of the event to be fired
        Parameters:
        event - the event to fire

      • registerListener

        @InternalUseOnly
void registerListener(Plugin plugin,
                                       Listener listener)
        Normally not needed to be used. Plugin listeners are automatically registered when they are loaded.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener instance to use to register

      • unregister

        void unregister(Class<? extends Listener> cls)
        Removes the listener from the caller queue, preventing it from being invoked
        Parameters:
        cls - the listener class to unregister
